entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: The main shopping street for wizards in London. It is described as a place where people can buy magical items and services.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is helping Harry Potter with his banking needs in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He has a safe in Diagon Alley where he keeps his money.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are creatures that work in the bank in Diagon Alley. They are responsible for managing the finances of wizards and witches.

relationships.description: Hagrid is working in Diagon Alley, helping Harry Potter with his banking needs.
Hagrid is working alongside goblins in the bank in Diagon Alley.
